poem:
### Markets and Tariffs

A single breath—  
Trump's tariffs slice,  
stirring the air,  
markets shiver,  
a swift decline.  

The pen scratches—  
inked shadows  
on a global page,  
sketched futures  
twisted—unseen.  

Underneath,  
pavement pulses with footsteps  
weighing change,  
in the echoes  
of a world reformed.
